name: Active Token Effects
description: Active Token Effects

name: Automated Animations
description: This will automatically run most JB2A Animations such as Melee/Ranged Attacks, Spell Attacks, and Instant Spells

name: Automated Conditions 5e
description: A small module for Foundry VTT that tries to automate some rolling aspects of the common 5e Conditions.

name: Better Roofs
description: Vision enhancements for roofs

name: BG3 Inspired HUD
description: A custom, persistent, token-specific HUD inspired by Baldur's Gate 3's interface. Provides an intuitive and modern way to manage abilities, spells, and effects for your tokens.

name: lib - Color Settings
description: Library that allows modules to add color settings and forms.

name: Carousel Combat Tracker
description: Carousel style combat tracker. Spiritual successor of Combat Carousel

name: Dynamic effects using Active Effects (DAE)
description: Replacement for dynamic effects

name: Dice Tray
description: Adds a dice tray below chat, and turns the d20 near chat into a dice calculator.

name: Dice So Nice!
description: Adds customizable 3D dice to Foundry VTT with lots of options to fit your playstyle.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Dungeon Master's Guide
description: Create thrilling adventures with this revised and expanded Dungeon Master's Guide. Inside this essential guide is everything new and experienced Dungeon Masters need to weave epic tales, build fantastical worlds, and inspire memorable moments for your party.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Monster Manual
description: Populate your worlds and adventures with the hundreds of monsters provided, and let their stories, illustrations, and easy-to-use stat blocks fuel your D&D® adventures for years to come. Encounter a monstrous menagerie of familiar favorites like dragons, giants, and mind flayers, plus a host of new monsters like the arch-hag, the blob of annihilation, and the vampire nightbringer.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Player's Handbook
description: Embark on an epic adventure 10 years in the making. This new and improved Player's Handbook® is the ultimate guide for fifth edition D&D players. Play your way with optimized rules for character creation and advancement, exploration, combat, equipment, spells, and much more. Create fantastic heroes from an expanded selection of character origins, classes, and subclasses, revised and balanced for maximum fun.

name: Tasha's Cauldron of Everything
description: Natasha the Dark, Iggwilv the Witch Queen, daughter of Baba Yaga or simply the witch named Tasha, well-known for her spells such as Tasha’s hideous laughter, has compiled all the precious lore she has gathered during her illustrious career as an adventurer for the enrichment of all. Her book offers a taste of the great power that awaits D&D players and dungeon masters everywhere! It contains new player subclasses, sidekicks, and rules and tools for Dungeon Masters.

name: DND5E Scriplets - 5E QOL bits and pieces
description: QOL bits and pieces with nowhere else to live

name: Easy Regions
description: Provides some quality-of-life improvements for managing Regions

name: Enhanced Region Behavior
description: Adds new region options to scene regions

name: Forien's Copy Environment
description: Allows for copying list of system/modules and versions, and gives ability to export/import game and player settings

name: Trazzm 5e Homebrew
description: A collection of homebrew for dnd5e

name: Item Piles
description: This module adds the ability for items to be dropped onto the ground, and then picked up.

name: Item Piles: D&D 5e
description: This module adds support for the D&D5e system within the Item Piles module

name: JB2A - Jules and Ben's Animated Assets - Free Content
description:
Animated Assets for spells, tiles, tokens, melee and ranged attacks

Troubleshooting and FAQ section on our website

Join our Discord server for any further questions

Preview our assets

Consider supporting us on Patreon for more !

name: libWrapper
description: Library for wrapping core Foundry VTT methods, meant to improve compatibility between packages that wrap the same methods.

name: Midi QOL
description: Automates rolling weapon/spell attacks and applying damage amongst other things

name: Module List Export
description: A simple module created to export the list of installed modules for record-keeping.

name: Monk's Active Tile Triggers
description: Want to teleport, or open doors, or hide characters, or display a message, or play a sound, or change a token's elevation when a token walks over a tile... now you can

name: Monk's Bloodsplats
description: Display dead creatures as bloodsplats to keep the battlefield clear of tokens. Bloodsplats are generated randomly per creature and show when the creature has a dead or defeated status. With options to change the colour and transparency of the blood splat, either individually or per world.

name: Monk's TokenBar
description: Add a bar with all the current player tokens.  Limit movement, roll saving throws, assign XP.

name: Monk's Wall Enhancement
description: Enhancements to the Wall Tool.  Drag points together, freehand draw a wall, plus more.

name: Baileywiki Mass Edit
description: Search and edit multiple placeables at the same time.

name: PnP - Pointer and Pings! (BETA)
description:
Gives all players the option to show a customizable cursor on demand, as well as ping any location with a custom ping!
Hotkeys, pings, pointer, everything customizable!
As GM you can also move your players view to your pin on demand.

name: Polyglot
description: Talk to others using a language you can speak and scrambles text you can't understand, in several fantasy scripts.

name: Portal
description: A library module for spawning creatures, teleporting tokens, and picking locations. Check the wiki for the scripting API.

name: Region Active Effects
description: Region Active Effects lets you attach active effects to regions.

name: Region Attacher
description: Allows attaching Scene Regions to templates on template creation

name: Rest Recovery for 5E
description: Adds 5e long and short rest mechanics and variant rules, such as feats, class features, and hit-dice healing.

name: Rideable
description: A small module to handle riding and mounting

name: routinglib
description: A library module to calculate a path between two points

name: Sequencer
description: This module allows you to play effects on the canvas, and create complex sequences of actions

name: socketlib
description: A library for easier handling of foundry sockets

name: Stealthy
description: Adds perception vs stealth checks to vision tests for tokens with the Hidden condition

name: TheRipper93's Module Hub
description: Utility for updates and troubleshooting of modules. Includes small tweaks such as Custom CSS, Compact Sidebar, Dice Tray, Auto rotation and more.

name: Times Up
description: Active expiry expiration

name: Token Attacher
description: Attach anything(even tokens) to tokens, so that they move when the token moves and rotate/move when the token rotates. Create prefabs and many more features, see the github readme for more details.

name: Token Magic FX
description: Add special effects and animations on your tokens, tiles, drawings and templates.

name: Token Warp
description: A small module for Foundry VTT, helping GMs to avoid revealing their maps by automatically removing tokens movement animation when going through walls.

name: Vision 5e
description: Vision Automation for D&D 5e

name: Wall Height
description: Adds the ability to set wall height for walls so that tokens can look and move over them.
